revised_title: Further Observations on Liquid Jets and the Influence of Vibration on Capillary Phenomena
tldr: The author investigates the behavior of liquid jets and their interaction with electricity and vibration. They discover that the addition of soap or milk can affect the scattering of the jet, and that the sensitivity to electricity is remarkable. The influence of vibration on capillary phenomena is also studied, with observations on the effects of overtones and consonant chords.
